mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS 'officeRecommendId', r.name, r.img, r.is_show AS 'isShow', r.is_open AS 'isOpen', r.franchisee_id AS 'franchiseeId', (select f.name from trains.sys_franchisee f where f.id = r.franchisee_id and f.del_flag = 0) AS 'franchiseeName', r.sort, r.create_by AS 'createBy.id', r.create_date AS 'createDate', r.update_by AS 'updateBy.id', r.update_date AS 'updateDate' FROM sys_office_recommend r WHERE r.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY r.sort DESC

SELECT id AS 'officeRecommendId', name, img, is_show AS 'isShow', is_open AS 'isOpen', franchisee_id AS 'franchiseeId', sort, create_by AS 'createBy.id', create_date AS 'createDate', update_by AS 'updateBy.id', update_date AS 'updateDate' FROM sys_office_recommend WHERE id = #{officeRecommendId} AND del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_office_recommend( name, img, is_show, is_open, franchisee_id, sort, create_by, create_date, del_flag )VALUES( #{name}, #{img}, 0, #{isOpen}, #{franchiseeId}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, SYSDATE(), 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_office_recommend SET name = #{name}, img = #{img}, is_open = #{isOpen}, franchisee_id = #{franchiseeId}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = SYSDATE() WHERE id = #{officeRecommendId}
mapper.select: SELECT orm.id AS 'officeRecommendMappingId', orm.recommend_id AS 'recommendId', orm.office_id AS 'officeId', orm.sort, o.name AS 'officeName' FROM sys_office_recommend_mapping orm LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = orm.office_id WHERE orm.recommend_id = #{recommendId} ORDER BY orm.sort DESC

SELECT orm.id AS 'officeRecommendMappingId', orm.recommend_id AS 'recommendId', orm.office_id AS 'officeId', orm.sort, o.name AS 'officeName' FROM sys_office_recommend_mapping orm LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = orm.office_id WHERE orm.id = #{officeRecommendMappingId}
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(orm.office_id) FROM sys_office_recommend_mapping orm LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = orm.office_id WHERE orm.recommend_id = #{recommendId}
